transforms.code:
#table_data is the data object to return
	table_data = []
		
	#Iterate over the results of the query
	for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
		row_struct = {}
		row_data = {}
		style = {}	
		#Map query results into correct attributes
		row_data['note_id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "id")
		row_data['time_created'] = value.getValueAt(row, "noteDate")
		row_data['name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "name")
		row_data['note_trunc'] = value.getValueAt(row, "note")[0:80]
		row_data['note'] = value.getValueAt(row, "note")
		row_data['groupId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "groupId")
		row_data['volunteerId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "volunteerId")
		#Set the default style for the row
		style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
		row_struct['value'] = row_data
		row_struct['style'] = style
		#Append the individual row date to the table data object
		table_data.append(row_struct)
					
	return table_data

notes_data = value
	#system.perspective.print(str(len(services_data)) + ' services found')
	table_data = []
	#Move the date from the case notes directly to the table
	if len(notes_data):
		for row in range(len(notes_data)):
			row_struct = {}
			note = {}
			style = {}	
			#Map query results into correct attributes
			#system.perspective.print('Table Data Processing Case Note' + str(notes_data[row].value.note_id))
			note['note_id'] = notes_data[row].value.note_id
			note['time_created'] = notes_data[row].value.time_created
			note['employee_id'] = notes_data[row].value.employee_id
			note['employee_name'] = notes_data[row].value.employee_name
			note['category'] = notes_data[row].value.category
			note['note'] = notes_data[row].value.note
			note['note_trunc'] = notes_data[row].value.note_trunc
			RowNumber = 0
			#system.perspective.print(str(len(services_data)) + ' services found')
#			
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Dashboard"

			row_struct['value'] = note
			row_struct['style'] = style
			#Append the individual row date to the table data object
			table_data.append(row_struct)
	
	return table_data

messageHandlers.script:
### Refresh data
	#system.perspective.print("Refresh Case Notes Dashboard")
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = None

#from time import sleep
		### Refresh data
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Case Notes Dashboard Data")
	view = self.view
	view.refreshBinding("custom.notes_data")
	view.refreshBinding("custom.services_data")
